snippet.title: RIN: The Last Child - gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Gameplay preview by one of the developers for incoming Metroidvania RIN: The Last Child.

Wishlist Rin: The Last Child on Steam: [] http://bit.ly/3OyK19x []

A dark fairytale Metroidvania with a unique spellcrafting system coming Q1 2023! 

Dive into the magical, mystical world build around the idea of creationism. Learn the story of RIN, develop your own playthrough style thanks to the complex spell-crafting system and decide whether free will is a blessing or a curse.

The fate of the World is in your hands. Choose your path wisely.


Wishlist Rin: The Last Child on Steam:
[]+[] https://store.steampowered.com/app/1960070/RIN_The_Last_Child/ []+[]
